name: For Great Honor
tooltip:
For Great HonorLevel 60

Bring 3 Alterac Valley Marks of Honor, 3 Arathi Basin Marks of Honor and 3 Warsong Gulch Marks of Honor to a Horde Warbringer outside the battlegrounds.

Requirements:
- Warsong Gulch Mark of Honor x 3
- Arathi Basin Mark of Honor x 3
- Alterac Valley Mark of Honor x 3
